titles.title: Solar and Geothermal Tax Credit Expansion Act
Solar and Geothermal Tax Credit Expansion Act
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide for an extension of the energy credit, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
Solar and Geothermal Tax Credit Expansion Act
This bill extends the energy tax credit for certain renewable resources, including solar and geothermal properties, and the credit for residential energy efficient property for five years.
